column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man riding a motorbike fast and with a lack of caution hit a BMW
column4: causing damage and giving himself minor injuries.------The incident happened at 11:30 pm on January 29
column9: the local authorities came to the scene
column10: and found the car owner demanding $ 3
